assetProfile.address2: Plot No: 14 Chithamanur Village Kancheepuram District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: S&S Power Switchgear Limited designs, manufactures, and sells circuit breaker products for indoor and outdoor applications in India and internationally. It offers spare parts and services; retrofit solutions, including circuit breaker and disconnector retrofit solutions; circuit breakers; medium voltage switchgear panels; and offload disconnectors, such as horizontal center and double breaks, pantographs, and vertical breaks. The company also provides electrical controls; relay panels; and automation solutions comprising light voltage control cubicles, control and relay panels, LCP for gas insulated switchgear, and drive box for disconnectors, as well as after sale services. In addition, it engages in the provision of engineering, manufacturing, testing, and supplying protection systems and associated products, such as engineered and standard protection systems, control panels, disconnector switches, battery chargers, and NER panels, as well as retrofit disconnector and engineering services to utilities. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Maraimalai Nagar, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. V.  Ramachandran
companyOfficers.title: Sr. Gen. Mang. of Corp. Affairs
